entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Badger
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:25 AM NST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.7°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle or flurries changing to flurries near noon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:36 AM NST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near zero.
